title: UI/UX Design Intern
description: Create wireframes and prototypes Design user interfaces for web and mobile apps Collaborate with product and frontend teams Conduct usability testing and iterate designs

title: Mobile App Development Intern
description: Develop Android and iOS applications Integrate APIs and backend services Test and debug mobile apps Collaborate with UI/UX and backend teams

title: Data Science Intern

title: Full Stack Developer Intern

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Develop backend APIs Write unit tests Collaborate with frontend team
